channel.title: Forex questions trading
channel.description:

One of the reasons that so much trading takes place with this currency pair is because it is the primary tool that traders prefer to use when it comes to speculating on the overall value of the dollar. You have the tools; its time to use them. The best way to gain knowledge is through experience, but that experience means nothing if you are not paying attention to how well your strategies are doing. If you consider Forex trading to be a hobby, then don't bother getting The Guidebook To Getting Rich With Forex Robots. Â Naturally you can not just leap in and make tons of money.

Of course no novice trader can understand the forex market just by looking at how his positions function in the market, so eToro also provided novices with plenty of guides, video tutorials, glossaries, community tools and practice opportunities.
